content.html: are there any female-identifying engineering leaders who have tried both the manager and IC tracks who'd be willing to talk me about how and why they chose the path that they did? i'd love to hear about the pros + cons of each path and how you knew which one was right for you :)
content.value:
are there any female-identifying engineering leaders who have tried both the manager and IC tracks who'd be willing to talk me about how and why they chose the path that they did?

i'd love to hear about the pros + cons of each path and how you knew which one was right for you :)
